text: Angela Merkel (born 1954) has been Chancellor of Germany since 2005. Merkel may also refer to: * Merkel (surname) * Merkel (firearms manufacturer) * Merkel, Texas, United States == See also == * Flying Merkel, motor cycle of the US-American company Merkel * Merkel cells in the skin ** Merkel cell cancer, a rare type of cancer * Merkel nerve endings, a type of slowly adapting mechanoreceptor in the skin * Merkel-Raute, a hand gesture associated with Angela Merkel * Merkle (disambiguation)
title: Merkel (disambiguation)
